content: > **multibuy coupon codes** > > any 2patterns 35% off - buy2get35 > > any 3 patterns 40% off - buy3get40 > > any 4 patterns 45% off - buy4get45 > > any 5 patterns 40% off - buy5get50 these christmas tree granny square coasters are a quick and easy festive crochet project perfect for adding a cosy christmas feel to your home made using a simple granny square pattern with a christmas tree motif they work up fast and are great for using up small amounts of yarn this beginner friendly pattern is suitable if you re comfortable with basic granny squares and simple colour changes the coasters are practical giftable and ideal for christmas decorating a video tutorial is included to guide you through each step this pattern is part of the **granny tree collection ebook** which also includes matching bunting and a christmas gift bag all made from the same festive granny square design
